body:
Comment 1: 
This is not possible without extending the capabilities of run-time reflection. Dynamic
creation of types is only possible for pointer types, but issue #2339 tracking a similar
possibility for channels or slices.

If you want your syntax to be type-safe, there might be an additional need for "generic
programming" in the language. If you don't, that means making the language not
type-safe, which doesn't look like Go's philosophy to me.
